name: Memory Game PAIRS Brain Chalenge
description:
PAIRS GAME is Memory Brain training, single player you can play many powerfull level, you can challenge your friends in multiplayer mode..

How to play: find a pair of cards with the same picture, there will be turn points at each step, make sure you find all cards with the same picture to continue to the next level..

Features:

1. Single player 30 levels

2. Local Multiplayer 1-2
